title: IMoveFaceFeatureData.OffsetDistance
description: Gets or sets the offset distance of this translated Move Face feature that has an end condition of Offset From Surface.
returns: Offset distance of this translated Move Face feature that has an end condition of Offset From Surface (see Remarks )
remarks:
For all other end conditions, use
IMoveFaceFeatureData::Distance
to get or set the offset distance of a translated Move Face feature.
To find out the type of:
Move Face feature, use
IMoveFaceFeatureData::MoveType
.
end condition, use
IMoveFaceFeatureData::EndCondition
.
